rules.title: Possible credential exposure
rules.suggestion: Avoid printing/storing secrets; use redaction or a vault reference

rules.title: Potentially destructive command
rules.suggestion: Use a dry-run, limit scope, confirm targets, or use a safer alternative

rules.title: Possible data exfiltration
rules.why: Command may send/receive data over the network
rules.suggestion: Confirm destination and ensure no secrets are included
